CyTOF

Introduction

Mass Cytometry combines the advantages of single cell high speed analysis common to conventional flow cytometry with the ability to resolve over 100 metal probes with minimal signal overlap common to atomic mass spectroscopy, thereby providing researchers with an unparalleled ability to phenotypically and functionally profile cells from normal and diseased states. http://www.dvssciences.com/mass-cytometry.php
